newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's O/N rates drop to end at 20.625 percent.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's O/N rates drop to end at 20.625 percent.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates dropped by 0.6 percentage points in balanced trade on Friday, and traders expected little change on Monday.
Overnight rates closed at 20.625 percent, down from 21.25 percent on Thursday.
"The rates would remain at this level or edge lower to 20.50 percent on Monday... unless there is a repo rate cut," said Balazs Varga of Inter-Europa Bank.
The National Bank of Hungary last cut its repo rates by 0.25 percentage points each on April 26.
The benchmark one-week reverse repo rate stands at 20.75 percent.
